rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A modern entrance with polished flooring and built-in storage.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious contemporary living space with open design, featuring integrated seating areas and ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Dining Space
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen area for a seamless dining experience.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Studio Area
rooms.description: Serves as an additional living space or office, designed with flexible furniture arrangements.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Fully equipped entertainment room featuring soundproofing and ambient lighting, integrated seating arrangements, and media console.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with ample natural light and built-in closets.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with private en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with fixtures designed according to Vastu for relaxation and energy flow.

openings.location: Between Ground Floor and First Floor

rooms.name: Studio Apartment (Duplex)
rooms.description: Fully furnished studio apartment designed for independent living, featuring a mini-kitchenette and sleeping area.
